tool_description: Calculates optimal reorder points and quantities for products based on historical demand patterns, lead times, and safety stock requirements.

demand_history_days.description: Days of demand history to analyze (30-365)

holding_cost_percentage.description: Annual holding cost as percentage of product value

current_stock.description: Current stock level for the product

error_messages: Invalid product ID: Product not found in system.
Invalid service level: Must be between 0.8 and 0.99.
Invalid demand history period: Must be between 30 and 365 days.
Insufficient demand data: Not enough historical data for reliable calculation.
Invalid cost parameters: All cost values must be positive numbers.
Invalid seasonality factor: Must be between 0.5 and 2.0.
Order quantity constraints invalid: min_order_quantity must be less than max_order_quantity.
usage: Provide product_id, lead_time_days, and current_stock as minimum inputs. Adjust service_level and demand_history_days for accuracy. Include cost parameters for economic order quantity optimization.
